metadata.title: Airborne Lidar and digital video survey  of the Bering Sea and North Pacific Ocean

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description: Lidar and digital video surveys from fixed aircraft concurrent with ground survey transects to develop remote techniques for discerning epipelagic fish and associated biological structure.  NOAA Fish Lidar Oceanic Experiment (FLOE) system. (532 nm)An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supporting NPMR Project "Airborne Lidar and digital video survey  of the Bering Sea and North Pacific Ocean"
